5514.verse: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

5515.verse: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

5518.verse: Then he turned back and was arrogant

5519.verse: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].

5520.verse: This is not but the word of a human being."

5521.verse: I will drive him into Saqar.

5522.verse: And what can make you know what is Saqar?

5523.verse: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],

5526.verse: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.

5528.verse: And [by] the night when it departs

5529.verse: And [by] the morning when it brightens,

5530.verse: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]

5532.verse: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.

5533.verse: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained

5534.verse: Except the companions of the right,

5535.verse: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other

5537.verse: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"

5538.verse: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,

5539.verse: Nor did we used to feed the poor.

5540.verse: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],

5541.verse: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense

5542.verse: Until there came to us the certainty."
